meta.description: Our free email newsletter is here: http://www.ihealthtube.com/content/newsletter Vaccine researcher and author Neil Miller discusses some of the more common arguments that are made in support of vaccinations. Find out why some of them don't make sense. Also find out what vaccinations he says are beneficial, but what the downside of those might be as well.

title: These Common Vaccine Arguments Rebuffed
cleaned_text:
Our free email newsletter is here: http://www.ihealthtube.com/content/newsletter

Vaccine researcher and author Neil Miller discusses some of the more common arguments that are made in support of vaccinations. Find out why some of them don't make sense. Also find out what vaccinations he says are beneficial, but what the downside of those might be as well.

opengraph.title: These Common Vaccine Arguments Rebuffed
